page.title: 05THE LOCAL POLICE
page.content: The school policeman has been in the police force for eighteen years.He enjoys his job because he says that things are never the same twice. In the area at any one time are fifteen policemen on patrol.They use radios and computers in the police station. Radios are used for contacting police on patrol in the area.The policeman on patrol carry small radios which can transmit or receive messages.Computers are used to check car numbers and list certain types of criminals. The type of cars they use on patrol are Ford Granadas,Ford Escorts,Ford Fiestas,Range Rovers and B.M.W.Motor Bikes. Our policeman is based in Downham Market.They have two jails there for holding criminals.
